info.title: Public Transport Victoria Timetable
info.description: The PTV Timetable API provides direct access to Public Transport Victoria???s public transport timetable data. The API returns scheduled timetable, route and stop data for all metropolitan and regional train, tram and bus services in Victoria, including Night Network(Night Train and Night Tram data are included in metropolitan train and tram services data, respectively, whereas Night Bus is a separate route type). The API also returns real-time data for metropolitan train, tram and bus services (where this data is made available to PTV), as well as disruption information, stop facility information, and access to myki ticket outlet data.

get.summary: Get V3 Departures Route Type Route Type Stop Stop
get.description: View departures for all routes from a stop.

parameters.name: route_type
parameters.description: Number identifying transport mode; values returned via RouteTypes API

parameters.name: stop_id
parameters.description: Identifier of stop; values returned by Stops API

parameters.name: platform_numbers
parameters.description: Filter by platform number at stop

parameters.name: direction_id
parameters.description: Filter by identifier of direction of travel; values returned by Directions API - /v3/directions/route/{route_id}

parameters.name: date_utc
parameters.description: Filter by the date and time of the request (ISO 8601 UTC format)

parameters.name: gtfs
parameters.description: Indicates that stop_id parameter will accept "GTFS stop_id" data

parameters.name: include_cancelled
parameters.description: Indicates if cancelled services (if they exist) are returned (default = false) - metropolitan train only

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: List objects to be returned in full (i.e. expanded) - options include: all, stop, route, run, direction, disruption

get.summary: Get V3 Departures Route Type Route Type Stop Stop Route Route
get.description: View departures for a specific route from a stop.

parameters.name: route_type
parameters.description: Number identifying transport mode; values returned via RouteTypes API

parameters.name: stop_id
parameters.description: Identifier of stop; values returned by Stops API

parameters.name: route_id
parameters.description: Identifier of route; values returned by Routes API - v3/routes

parameters.name: direction_id
parameters.description: Filter by identifier of direction of travel; values returned by Directions API - /v3/directions/route/{route_id}

parameters.name: date_utc
parameters.description: Filter by the date and time of the request (ISO 8601 UTC format)

parameters.name: gtfs
parameters.description: Indicates that stop_id parameter will accept "GTFS stop_id" data

parameters.name: include_cancelled
parameters.description: Indicates if cancelled services (if they exist) are returned (default = false) - metropolitan train only

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: List objects to be returned in full (i.e. expanded) - options include: all, stop, route, run, direction, disruption

get.description: View directions that a route travels in.

parameters.name: route_id
parameters.description: Identifier of route; values returned by Routes API - v3/routes

get.description: View all routes for a direction of travel.

parameters.name: direction_id
parameters.description: Identifier of direction of travel; values returned by Directions API - /v3/directions/route/{route_id}

get.summary: Get V3 Directions Direction Route Type Route Type
get.description: View all routes of a particular type for a direction of travel.

parameters.name: direction_id
parameters.description: Identifier of direction of travel; values returned by Directions API - /v3/directions/route/{route_id}

parameters.name: route_type
parameters.description: Number identifying transport mode; values returned via RouteTypes API

get.description: View all disruptions for all route types.

parameters.name: route_types
parameters.description: Filter by route_type; values returned via RouteTypes API

get.description: View all disruptions for a particular route.

parameters.name: route_id
parameters.description: Identifier of route; values returned by Routes API - v3/routes

get.description: View a specific disruption.

parameters.name: disruption_id
parameters.description: Identifier of disruption; values returned by Disruptions API - /v3/disruptions OR /v3/disruptions/route/{route_id}

get.summary: Get V3 Pattern Run Run Route Type Route Type
get.description: View the stopping pattern for a specific trip/service run.

parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: Identifier of a trip/service run; values returned by Runs API - /v3/route/{route_id} and Departures API

parameters.name: route_type
parameters.description: Number identifying transport mode; values returned via RouteTypes API

parameters.name: stop_id
parameters.description: Filter by stop_id; values returned by Stops API

parameters.name: date_utc
parameters.description: Filter by the date and time of the request (ISO 8601 UTC format)

get.description: View all route types and their names.
View route names and numbers for all routes.

parameters.name: route_types
parameters.description: Filter by route_type; values returned via RouteTypes API

parameters.name: route_name
parameters.description: Filter by name  of route (accepts partial route name matches)

get.description: View route name and number for specific route id.

parameters.name: route_id
parameters.description: Identifier of route; values returned by Routes API - v3/routes

get.description: View all trip/service runs for a specific route id.

parameters.name: route_id
parameters.description: Identifier of route; values returned by Routes API - v3/routes

get.summary: Get V3 Runs Route Route Route Type Route Type
get.description: View all trip/service runs for a specific route id and route type.

parameters.name: route_id
parameters.description: Identifier of route; values returned by Routes API - v3/routes

parameters.name: route_type
parameters.description: Number identifying transport mode; values returned via RouteTypes API

get.description: View all trip/service runs for a specific run id.

parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: Identifier of a trip/service run; values returned by Runs API - /v3/route/{route_id} and Departures API

get.summary: Get V3 Runs Run Route Type Route Type
get.description: View the trip/service run for a specific run id and route type.

parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: Identifier of a trip/service run; values returned by Runs API - /v3/route/{route_id} and Departures API

parameters.name: route_type
parameters.description: Number identifying transport mode; values returned via RouteTypes API

get.description: View stops, routes and myki ticket outlets that match the search term.

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: Search text (note: if search text is numeric and/or less than 3 characters, the API will only return routes)

parameters.name: route_types
parameters.description: Filter by route_type; values returned via RouteTypes API

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Filter by geographic coordinate of latitude

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Filter by geographic coordinate of longitude

parameters.name: max_distance
parameters.description: Filter by maximum distance (in metres) from location specified via latitude and longitude parameters

parameters.name: include_addresses
parameters.description: Placeholder for future development; currently unavailable

parameters.name: include_outlets
parameters.description: Indicates if outlets will be returned in response (default = true)

get.summary: Get V3 Stops Location Latitude , Longitude
get.description: View all stops near a specific location.

parameters.name: route_types
parameters.description: Filter by route_type; values returned via RouteTypes API

parameters.name: max_distance
parameters.description: Filter by maximum distance (in metres) from location specified via latitude and longitude parameters

get.summary: Get V3 Stops Route Route Route Type Route Type
get.description: View all stops on a specific route.

parameters.name: route_id
parameters.description: Identifier of route; values returned by Routes API - v3/routes

parameters.name: route_type
parameters.description: Number identifying transport mode; values returned via RouteTypes API

get.summary: Get V3 Stops Stop Route Type Route Type
get.description: View facilities at a specific stop (metro and v/line stations only).

parameters.name: stop_id
parameters.description: Identifier of stop; values returned by Stops API

parameters.name: route_type
parameters.description: Number identifying transport mode; values returned via RouteTypes API

parameters.name: stop_location
parameters.description: Indicates if stop location information will be returned (default = false)

parameters.name: stop_amenities
parameters.description: Indicates if stop amenity information will be returned (default = false)

parameters.name: stop_accessibility
parameters.description: Indicates if stop accessibility information will be returned (default = false)

parameters.name: stop_contact
parameters.description: Placeholder for future development; currently unavailable

parameters.name: stop_ticket
parameters.description: Placeholder for future development; currently unavailable

parameters.name: gtfs
parameters.description: Indicates that stop_id parameter will accept "GTFS stop_id" data
